titleStmt.title: Revisions to Henry David Thoreau's manuscript of Walden

publicationStmt.p: Final Project for ENGL 340, Literature and Literary Study in the Digital Age, Spring 2020, SUNY Geneseo.

sourceDesc.bibl: A page from HM 924, the manuscript of Walden, "Economy", "Page 3", "Paragraph 2b", "Version C"

zone.note: We are encoding the revisions throughout the third page of Walden in Version C. We chose this page due to the variety of revisions such as additions and deletions via strikethroughs. The timeline focuses on how Thoreau reflects on his experience over time and how he chooses to revise his work based on this.
